function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in household energy use due to prolonged time spent at home during the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Higher energy consumption may result in increased indoor air pollution and contribute to the spread of airborne diseases within households.","Mitigation":"Promote energy-efficient practices and use of air purifiers to reduce indoor air pollution and airborne disease transmission.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, air purifiers, ventilation systems.","People":"Household occupants.","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, energy efficiency organizations."},{"Description":"Surge in COVID-19 cases coinciding with an increase in non-HVAC energy use during a specific period.","Impact":"Higher energy use during a surge in cases may indicate a higher level of viral transmission, potentially leading to increased illness and strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health measures, including testing, contact tracing, and temporary lockdowns, to control the spread of the virus.","Technologies":"COVID-19 testing kits, contact tracing apps, data analytics for monitoring case trends.","People":"General public, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, healthcare organizations."}]}
